message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the income statement.

Looking at the income statement provided, the line item that represents the carrying amount of inventories sold would be "Cost of Goods Sold". This is the standard accounting term for the cost of inventory that has been sold to customers during the period.

In the income statement, I can see that the Cost of Goods Sold is listed as 3,085,000.00 on 2024-01-28.

Therefore, the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period is 3,085,000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '3085000.00'} }
```
